trans-unit.source: Creates a quadratic Bezier curve between two points in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 的两点之间创建一条二次贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to create composite shapes using <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment> objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>对象，若要创建使用复合形状<xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment>对象和其他段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment> class does not contain a property for the starting point of the line.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment>类并不包含行的起始点的属性。

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the line is the end point of the previous segment, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> if no other segments exist.
trans-unit.target: 行的起点是前一条线段，终结点或<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>如果不存在其他线段。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment> objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment>对象继承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，它们提供几个特殊功能： 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享、 进行只读的以提高性能、 克隆，和设为线程安全。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关不同功能提供的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The control point of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的控制点。

trans-unit.source: The end point of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的终点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> is to be stroked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要绘制该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> class with the specified control point, end point, and Boolean indicating whether to stroke this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的控制点、终点和指示是否绘制该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的布尔值来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="false" />，所克隆对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置曲线的控制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The control point of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的控制点。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point1" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point1" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 的终 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />。

trans-unit.source: The end point of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的终点。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point2" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point2" /> 依赖项属性。
